content: 3/7/2021 english pattern released this sock design is filled with cute climbing roses please note that there are two charts chart a and chart b and exchanging left and right charts is required to create asymmetrical design added is a simple check pattern to highlight roses and a tiny rose is hidden in the gusset on the sole -size- woman s s - m leg circumference 21cm -gauge- 10 sts and 10 5 row = 1 2 5cm in stranded knitting on us size 1 2 25mm needles -needles- us size 0 2 00 mm and us size 1 2 25 mm circular needles or adjust size to obtain the correct gauge -yarn- light fingering weight sock yarn the yarns shown in the photos are main color mc ricca yarn hibinoito 75% wool 25% nylon #special color 100g 437 yards 400m contrasting color cc opal 4 ply solids 75% wool 25% nylon #anthrazit 100g 465 yards 425m if you want to make it larger or longer prepare more yarn -notions- stitch markers and a tapestry needle 可愛らしいバラの花がツル状に咲いている様を表現したデザイン。左右でバラの向きがアシンメトリーになるようチャートが二つあります。バラ柄を引き立てるためシンプルなチェック柄をコーディネート。足裏のガセットにも小さなバラが可憐に咲いています。
